description.value:
Halflings have a reputation for larceny and guile, and sometimes this reputation is deserved. Halflings with this species trait gain a +2 bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.GcVVfpQ79HdcMqBt]{Bluff} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.qVEW9HjXQN0ok879]{Sleight of Hand} checks, and Sleight of Hand is a class skill for them.

This replaces sure-footed.

Add class skill in the selected class item's Details tab.
